AbsMap< M > Class Template Reference
[Map Adaptors]

Detailed Description

template<typename M>
class lemon::AbsMap< M >

This read-only map returns the absolute value of the values of the given map. Its Key and Value are inherited from M. Value must be comparable to 0 and the unary - operator must be defined for it, of course.

The simplest way of using this map is through the absMap() function.

#include <lemon/maps.h>
